downloadTitle: Microsoft MapPoint 2013 and Microsoft Streets & Trips 2013 Construction Data Update
downloadDescription: Download the latest construction data to keep your maps current.
detailsSection: Download the latest construction data file to keep your MapPoint 2013 and Streets & Trips 2013 maps up-to-date with the latest road construction data.
installInstructionSection:
1. Close Streets & Trips and/or MapPoint.
  2. Click the download link to start the download.
  3. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  4. Save the file in the Data folder
    • For XP
      C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\Microsoft\Microsoft Streets & Trips\19.0\Data
      or
      C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\Microsoft\Microsoft MapPoint\19.0\Data
    • For Vista and Windows 7
      C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Microsoft Streets & Trips\19.0\Data
      or
      C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Microsoft MapPoint\19.0\Data
  5. Restart Streets & Trips and/or MapPoint.
